duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance and support to computer system users, including troubleshooting hardware and software issues.
Respond to client inquiries via telephone, in person, or remotely, and resolve technical problems in a timely manner.
Communicate effectively with clients to ensure a clear understanding of their technical issues and provide appropriate solutions.
Collaborate with the technical support team to share knowledge and resolve complex technical problems.
Maintain accurate records of client interactions, transactions, and technical issues for future reference.
